name: Paul BRANDON, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Brandon v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation Parole

parties: Paul BRANDON, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 27th day of December, 2002, probable jurisdiction is noted and the order appealed is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
813 A.2d 642
Paul BRANDON, Appellant, v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION PAROLE, Appellee.
No. 127 MAP 2002.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 27, 2002.
